meaning: fair and tender, soft and white (skin)
description: Describes skin that is white, soft, and delicate. Also written as 白嫩嫩.

examples.chinese: 怎么这么白白嫩嫩,太好看了
examples.translation: How is it so fair and tender, so beautiful

examples.chinese: 白嫩嫩的皮肤狠狠羡慕住了
examples.translation: I am so envious of that fair and tender skin

examples.chinese: 露出白白嫩嫩的小细腿真的很能让人发疯发狂
examples.translation: Showing those fair and tender legs really drives people crazy
